about_the_game:
Escape Memoirs: Bank Heist” is a co-operative reverse escape-room puzzle game, where you are a member of a burglar gang which is planning on pulling of a bank heist. Unfortunately for you, the security of the bank is top notch, and the vault unbreakable. Being only equipped with your wits, skills, and a bag full of criminal gadgets, you must make full use of your brain power to overcome the challenges that await you.

Solve Puzzles

From deductive reasoning to security devices of all kind, you will face a wide variety of puzzles that will test your logical thinking skills, as you try to finish your job.

Explore and Discover

You will get to explore a extravagant bank as you take on its many challenges. There will be plenty of hidden collectibles for you to find as you try to pull off the heist.

Work Together

Play solo or work together with friends, in up to 5-player multiplayer. So, pick up a friend or four, and go heisting together!
